column5: Uhhh....I'm not too sure about this one....  <object width="450" height="370"><param name="movie" value="http://www.liveleak.com/e/bbe_1304042750"></param><param'>http://www.liveleak.com/e/bbe_1304042750"></param><param name="wmode" value="transparent"></param><param name="allowscriptaccess" value="always"></param><embed src="http://www.liveleak.com/e/bbe_1304042750" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" wmode="transparent" allowscriptaccess="always" width="450" height="370"></embed></object>

I don't see how that could possibly end badly.
Looks like the sword was a bad idea. The freddie glove is better idea.   Funny  thanks  carper
wait to when we are fishing like them in lake ontario it won't be funny

That was fantastic
Might be more effective to just boat around with a wide hopper wood chipper mounted on the front...
I'm in.

LOL that.was.awesome! thanks for the laugh
LOL you guys are far too responsible!  That was epic.  I agree, the Freddy Claw was far more lethal than the samurai sword.
